title: What are the dangers of thinking you know everything? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’re like a frog in the well. If you think you know everything then you’re like a frog who is stuck in a well. He can only see a small portion of the sky and thinks that’s the entire world. But he is wrong. You tend to make decisions with insufficient information. You think you know everything and don’t research on the decision you’re taking and act with insufficient information which can be lethal to you. You tend to be arrogant and ignorant You don’t do the thing which God wanted you to do. “Iqra” - read and explore the vast world. You feel superior to others and might be laughed at You: Shut up! You moron of a professor! I know electrolyticemulsificationicsticsupercalifragilisticexprencidocius. Prof: Sit down, we read that in Chapter 1. You: … You try to prove you are better and get insulted Nothing to say, you’ve been through this. Hope you find this list interesting!
